title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union corporal's uniform with 1858 Army hat of Company H, 4th Infantry Regiment in front of painted backdrop showing outdoor scene] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union corporal's uniform with 1858 Army hat of Company H, 4th Infantry Regiment in front of painted backdrop showing outdoor scene] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 9.4 x 8.1 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: (front) Cross and scroll motif; (back) Rinhart, no. 191. Additional information in collections file. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Published in: Campbell, J. Duncan and Michael J. O'Donnell, Michael. American military headgear insignia. Alexandria, Virginia: O'Donnell Publishing, 2004, p. 154. Subjects: United States.--Army--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Union--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Union--1860-1870. Backdrops--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Union. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Tintypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.27086 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2233
